name: SoulSucker
description:
Best played FullScreen A Brackeys Jam 2020.2 GameJam Entree In the future where people live there lives in robot bodies and became immortal. Those robot body's got hacked and for 100th years people where trapped until a hero rises...

Its a short top-down adventure action game and is playable till the end :) (last level is hard but its possible!)


Controlls:
Keyboard and mouse (buttons)

Music By:
Bruno Torrano

Since its a game jam and limited time a lot of things did not end up in the game. Follow this project if you like it, since i want to make a final version including al the missing parts like music connected to gameplay, cutscenes + story and more levels.
